text:
The terms "departmental revolving fund" and "revolving fund," in either the singular or plural, as used hereinafter, shall be taken to the inclusive of any subdivisions of any revolving fund which may be authorized. 
(Added by Ord. 17-62, App. 1/17/62)

heading.catch_text: CASH REVOLVING FUNDS – "CASH REVOLVING FUND" CONSTRUED.

chapter.text: FINANCE, TAXATION, AND OTHER FISCAL MATTERS
